thread.title: Uber plans to go public in 18 to 24 months, leaked presentation shows
thread.title_full: Uber plans to go public in 18 to 24 months, leaked presentation shows

author: Riley McDermid
title: Uber plans to go public in 18 to 24 months, leaked presentation shows
text:
Paolo Vescia Uber Technologies CEO Travis Kalanick San Francisco based ride-sharing service Uber plans to go public within 18 to 24 months, according to a leaked presentation obtained by Reuters . In the confidential slideshow created for Chinese investors, Uber also projects its bookings will increase three-fold this year to $10.84 billion and $26.12 billion in 2016. Reuters calculated that would add up to $2 billion in revenue for Uber this year. For the full story, visit the Silicon Valley Business Journal. 
Get Albany
